name: react-components
description: React components for PX Blue applications

scripts.initialize: git submodule init && git submodule update && yarn install:dependencies
scripts.install:dependencies: cd demos/showcase && yarn && cd ../storybook && yarn && cd ../../components && yarn
scripts.start:showcase: yarn install:dependencies && yarn link:components && cd demos/showcase && yarn start
scripts.start:storybook: yarn install:dependencies && yarn link:components && cd demos/storybook && yarn start
scripts.lint: cd components && yarn lint && cd ../demos/storybook && yarn lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd components && yarn lint:fix && cd ../demos/storybook && yarn lint:fix
scripts.prettier: cd components && yarn prettier && cd ../demos/showcase && yarn prettier && cd ../storybook && yarn prettier
scripts.prettier:check: cd components && yarn prettier:check && cd ../demos/showcase && yarn prettier:check && cd ../storybook && yarn prettier:check

author: pxblue <pxblue@eaton.com>
